tags: A song of ice and fire
title: ASOIF/ Game of Thrones Fanfic
body:
The Big Four in Westeros by xTonyaJacex

The big four are reincarnated as Game of thrones characters. This changes the game from the very beginning and Westeros has no idea just what awaits them. [The big four reincarnation]
Character Roles:
Rapunzel as Margaery Tyrell
Hiccup as Daenerys Targaryen
Merida as Arya Stark
Jack Frost as Jon Snow

[Nobody asked for this but it wouldn’t leave my brain.]

Preview: 

It is the first time Hiccup feels something other than emptiness in his chest. He shuts out the world, ignores the anger of his brother, the commands of his husband. Instead, Hiccup reaches out for the three dragon eggs. Only when his fingers brush against the shell of the pure as night coloured egg does he feel the pulsing burn on his skin and blood.

He cries and feels the thrum of life in response to his touch.

“Hey bud. You found me”

It’s the first time Hiccup feels alive in this new life of his.

summary: [NO SPOILERS] How can I convince my mom to watch the show?
title: [NO SPOILERS] How can I convince my mom to watch the show?
body:
She knows that me and dad both watched the show 3 times so she knows it must be good but she said that she just can’t watch that much violence and killing. I told her that there is indeed much violence but it’s not pointless violence, it’s related to the story and it makes sense.

Is there anything else I can tell her to convice her?

She also knows that I’ve liked the show so much that I read all the books after that and bought a lot of GoT shit



Source: https://ift.tt/2ksKkG0

tags: A song of ice and fire
title: ASOIF/Game Of Thrones Fanfic
body:
The Winter Storm Queen by TJ-182

Robert Baratheon marries Eddard Stark’s second sister instead of Cersei. The south have no idea the change she will bring upon them. Anya Stark, the winter wolf of Winterfell, is no sheep and with her follows the harsh cold of the North. To her enemies, beware for winter is coming.

OR

Robert Baratheon marries a Stark, just not the sister he first intended

Preview: 

“Would you like to hold her Ned?” Lyarra cooed

“Can I?!”

“Of course, but you must be seated just to be safe.”

Doing as instructed, Eddard was allowed to hold his newest sister. If Rickard had not been watching the situation intently, he would have missed the cunning smirk Eddard had given Brandon. He found himself surprised at such smarts appearing so early and from the sour look on Brandon’s face, he too realised he’d been outwitted.

“Hello…… I’m your brother.” Eddard introduced

The silence that followed was filled with adoration from the two boys. Lyanna too seemed to quiet in Brandon’s hold, starring at the strange bundle in her brother’s hold. Lyarra appeared to be forcing herself awake, not wanting to forget such a moment. Rickard knew that he would never forget such a moment himself.

“What’s her name father?” Brandon questioned softly, the most subdued he’s been since his birth. When he was sure both boys were paying him plenty attention, Rickard voiced the name of his newest daughter.

“Her name is Anya. Anya Stark, first of her name.”

blog.name: thiskindofshootingstar
blog.title: Stars Don't Fall for Men
blog.description: 23, INFJ, Ravenclaw, Targaryen Loyalist | Sometimes write, sometimes make edits, always overtag | In this household we love and respect Octavia Blake and Daenerys Targaryen

tags: thanks for coming to my ted talk
i was just thinking about this earlier
body:
Ya know

Everyone (antis) always uses the “bittersweet ending” and “unpredictability” of game of thrones as reason for why dany will either die or turn evil at the end but like??? Daughter of madman becomes mad or hero sacrifices self to save world or yet another woman dies in childbirth is like so predictable and not bittersweet they’re straight tragic because she is inarguably The hero of the story.

What would be totally unpredicted and bittersweet would be a cersei lannister redemption arc. Like honestly how crazy would that be??? After everything she’s done?! And especially if jon and dany (who have been told/made to fight for the throne) go off and just have normal lives raise a family and Cersei remains queen but now a good one like what?? I know it’s too crazy to happen but sounds pretty cool to me and will now be my response to anyone who tries to use those lines as reasons for any anti-dany predictions

tags: a song of ice and fire
title: Hi!!
body:
Okay so, I’ve written a couple of fanfic’s for the Teen Wolf, Riverdale, Game of Thrones and Disney fandoms. This is just a bit of self-promotion and it would be awesome if you all could check it out. 

I’m always looking for feedback and constructive criticism is greatly appreciated. 

I’m on Ao3 and Fanfiction.Net ( I have two accounts so this is the second one -> Fanfiction.Net ) so support would be awesome :D


THANK YOU :)

summary: [NO Spoilers] Q&A with Daniel Portman today. Star struck!
title: [NO Spoilers] Q&A with Daniel Portman today. Star struck!
body:
Armageddon expo, Tauranga, Bay of plenty, NZ. Such an intelligent and laid back guy. Great sense of humour. I was star truck!, asked first question, and rest of Q and a was great. His sense of humour is so good.



Source: https://ift.tt/2J7Xtm4
